document_data.name: Thaerefoil
document_data.mainbody: '''Thaerefoil''' was a plant known to grow in [[Cormyr]] and perhaps elsewhere in [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Uses: When consumed as a [[tea]] or even by swallowing the paste of chewed leaves, thaerefoil diminished the physical lusts of men for a time being. To chew and swallow a single leaf would make a man impotent for days.
